N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7612.7 - Bedding and linen

State Regulations
(a) The
department shall require that each facility provide for the issuance of
suitable clean bedding and linen, including at a minimum two sheets, a
pillowcase, one mattress and sufficient blankets to provide comfort under
existing temperature controls. (b) Mattresses and mattress covers shall be constructed of approved fire-retardant
and water-resistant materials which are easily sanitized. Notes
